godot_add_library(vorbis FOLDER thirdparty STATIC)
target_sources(vorbis PRIVATE
        analysis.c
        backends.h
        #barkmel.c
        bitrate.c
        bitrate.h
        block.c
        books/uncoupled/res_books_uncoupled.h
        books/floor/floor_books.h
        books/coupled/res_books_51.h
        books/coupled/res_books_stereo.h
        codebook.c
        codebook.h
        codec_internal.h
        envelope.c
        envelope.h
        floor0.c
        floor1.c
        highlevel.h
        info.c
        lookup.c
        lookup_data.h
        lookup.h
        lpc.c
        lpc.h
        lsp.c
        lsp.h
        mapping0.c
        masking.h
        mdct.c
        mdct.h
        misc.h
        modes/residue_44p51.h
        modes/psych_44.h
        modes/floor_all.h
        modes/setup_X.h
        modes/setup_44u.h
        modes/residue_44.h
        modes/psych_16.h
        modes/residue_16.h
        modes/setup_32.h
        modes/psych_11.h
        modes/setup_11.h
        modes/psych_8.h
        modes/residue_8.h
        modes/setup_16.h
        modes/setup_8.h
        modes/setup_44p51.h
        modes/setup_44.h
        modes/setup_22.h
        modes/residue_44u.h
        os.h
        psy.c
        psy.h
        #DEAD code according to documentation
        #psytune.c
        registry.c
        registry.h
        res0.c
        scales.h
        sharedbook.c
        smallft.c
        smallft.h
        synthesis.c
        #tone.c
        vorbis/vorbisenc.h
        vorbis/codec.h
        vorbis/vorbisfile.h
        vorbisenc.c
        vorbisfile.c
        window.c
        window.h
)
target_link_libraries(vorbis PUBLIC ogg)
target_include_directories(vorbis PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
